A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars is now a Disney\, Pirates of the Caribbean\, style movie. Alone it is a good flick but anyone who is looking to find the magic that George Lucas brought to the original trilogy will be left feeling lost\, and maybe angry. The Kylo character is better\, but what they did to Luke is a travesty. The movie refers unto itself\, \"you have no place in this story.\" which i thought to be a slap in the face to the trilogy. Cheesy jokes are far to prevalent\, it's almost as if they don't want us to take this movie seriously.
